In England, in the seven days to 11 December, there were 305,434 new confirmed cases (540.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 December, there were 284,534 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (20,900 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 December is 9,420,017 (16,657.8 cases per 100,000 population).
